title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.1 - Hunting, trapping and fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.1 - Hunting, trapping and fishing

State Regulations

Hunting, trapping and fishing are permitted on wildlife
management areas and other lands subject to Subchapter A of this Part, except
as specifically restricted by posted notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
51.1

Adopted

New

York State Register November 3, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 44, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
